            <div class="directory-header__description-text">

<b>How is this Table Populated?</b>


<p>The table above uses our unbiased Leaders Matrix data within the software development service line. The Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the best-performing software development companies, each company featured is evaluated on specific criteria. This criteria includes Area of Focus and Ability to Deliver. Area of Focus accounts for a company’s specialization within a certain service. Ability to Deliver includes client reviews, past projects, market presence and reputation in the industry. These are not paid placements.</p>

<p>Note: This table was last updated on January 28, 2025.</p>

<b><p>Clutch Offers Objective, Independent Research &amp; Verified Client Experiences</p></b>

<p>Clutch empowers better business decisions as the leading marketplace of B2B service providers. Our in-depth and verified client experiences detail each project from start to finish, helping businesses looking to procure services, narrow down their list of potential business partners quickly and confidently.</p>

<p>With access to information such as how much a service provider charges for their services, how they communicate, and the results of the project, you can feel confident that you’ve found the right software development company for your project.</p>

<p>The verification process seeks to establish proof of connection between the reviewer and their own organization, as well as the collaboration they’re reviewing. By verifying the identity of the reviewer and confirming their connection to the project, Clutch is able to confirm that there is no conflict of interest and that the project took place. Buyers can easily identify verified reviews by the check mark in the bottom right corner of the review card. You can learn more about the <a href="https://help.clutch.co/en/knowledge/how-clutch-verifies-reviews"> review verification process here</a>.</p>

<b><p>Bespoke Software Development Expertise</p></b>

<p>Software development companies on Clutch are highly skilled and vetted. They are certified bespoke software developers with familiarity in multiple programming languages, frameworks, and application platforms. Whether you’re looking for a no-code, low-code, or fully custom platform, Clutch software development companies deliver high-quality results.</p>

<p>In addition to review rating, you can view awards, portfolio of past work and clients and industry recognitions. Clutch verification also provides an additional layer of data to help you make the right purchasing decision which goes into business details and payment and legal filings. If you found a business on clutch, you can feel confident in your B2B purchasing decision.</p>

<b><p>How Much does a Software Development Company Cost?</p></b>

Most custom software development projects on Clutch cost between $10,000–$49,999, but the total price depends on a variety of factors, including how complex the software is. In terms of hourly rate, you can expect to pay between $25-$49 per hour, but as the scope of your project expands, the more resources, time, and experience is required to bring your vision to life. As a result, the overall cost of your project will increase as well.<br>
<br>
<b><p>6 Questions to Ask Software Development Companies Before Hiring</p></b>

<p>Ask these questions when interviewing software agencies:</p>

<b><p>What is your experience with projects similar to ours?</p></b>

<p>By asking about their previous work, you can gauge whether they can deliver a product that meets your needs.To get a better understanding of what it could be like to work with a software development firm you’re talking with, ask them what their development process is like and the results were of similar projects </p>

<p>Better yet, ask them about hurdles they’ve experienced over the course of the project and how they overcame them.</p>

<b><p>Can you provide references or case studies from previous clients?</p></b>

<p>References provide valuable insights into the company’s past performance, reliability, and quality of work. Speaking directly with previous clients can help you understand how the company handles project challenges, communicates with clients, and meets deadlines. This first-hand feedback is often more candid and detailed than any marketing materials or case studies.</p>

<p>Moreover, references can shed light on the company's ability to deliver on its promises and maintain long-term relationships. By asking specific questions about the scope, budget adherence, and overall satisfaction, you can gain a clearer picture of what to expect. </p>

<b><p>What is your development process and how do you handle project management?</p></b>

<p>Project management is a key aspect of a successful software development partnership. Great software development companies have workflows and methodologies in place to make sure that the development process keeps moving forward. </p>

<p>Effective project management helps to set clear objectives, delineate responsibilities, and establish timelines, which are essential for keeping a project on track. By utilizing structured methodologies and tools, project managers can streamline processes, identify potential risks early, and allocate resources more effectively. </p>

<b><p>How do you ensure the quality of the software you develop?</p></b>

<p>Software development companies need to ensure that the product not only meets the project requirements but is also reliable, efficient, and user-friendly. To do this, they should allocate part of the project budget to testing and quality assurance. Understanding how they intend to do this ensures that the developer has a structured approach to managing and mitigating risks. </p>

<p>It also highlights their ability to provide consistent documentation, timely updates, and comprehensive support. A developer’s answer to this question can reveal their level of experience, attention to detail, and problem-solving skills, which are critical for delivering a successful product.</p>

<b><p>What is your approach to post-launch support and maintenance?</p></b>

<p>Post-launch support and regular maintenance are vital for the sustainability and continued success of any software solution. By asking companies about their support and maintenance strategies, you can ensure that you partner with a firm that prioritizes not just the development, but the longevity and reliability. </p>

<b><p>How do you manage communication and collaboration during the project?</p></b>

<p>Effective communication fosters transparency and trust between the client and the outsourcing provider, making it a cornerstone of a productive partnership. When outsourcing to a bespoke software development company, you should have established communication channels and regular touch points. This ensures smooth communication between your team and theirs, and also provides opportunities for collaboration and feedback, ensuring that the project runs smoothly. </p>

<b><p>Browse popular software programming languages:</p></b>  <a href="https://clutch.co/developers/sql">SQL developers</a>, <a href="https://clutch.co/developers/cplusplus">C++ developers</a> and <a href="https://clutch.co/developers/flutter">Flutter developers</a>. Also, be sure to examine software developers in different locations, such as <a href="https://clutch.co/developers/uk">UK software developers</a>, <a href="https://clutch.co/us/developers">US software developers</a>, <a href="https://clutch.co/ca/developers">Canada software developers</a>.

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Hard working
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently commend Simform for their hard work and dedication across various projects. One client praised their team for going &#39;above and beyond&#39; in developing an intuitive app, while another highlighted the &#39;dedicated and hard working&#39; nature of their resources. A co-founder noted that Simform&#39;s team is &#39;integrated&#39; and &#39;hard-working,&#39; contributing significantly to project success. Overall, the sentiment surrounding Simform&#39;s work ethic is overwhelmingly positive, reflecting their commitment to client satisfaction.
      </p>
    </div>

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Easy to work with
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Designli has received consistently positive feedback regarding their ease of collaboration. Clients noted their exceptional communication skills, with one CEO highlighting Designli&#39;s ability to simplify complex concepts for non-technical founders. Another client praised the team&#39;s willingness to help and their proactive updates. Overall, clients described Designli as approachable, responsive, and effective in setting clear expectations, further emphasizing that they foster a supportive and engaging working relationship.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Hard working
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently highlight Brainhub&#39;s strong work ethic and dedication to achieving project goals. One reviewer noted, &#39;The people from Brainhub are highly-skilled and they work hard to achieve our goals,&#39; emphasizing their commitment to learning new technologies quickly as needed. Overall, the sentiment reflects a high level of appreciation for their hard-working nature and ability to contribute significantly to project success.
      </p>
    </div>

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="1815382"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1087997"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Professional
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Professional
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The client feedback regarding ADHD Interactive reflects a strong sentiment of professionalism. Clients noted their excellent responsiveness, commitment to deadlines, and ability to address last-minute requirements effectively. Specific praise included their can-do attitude, prompt and innovative solutions, and honest communication. One client emphasized their total commitment and professionalism over a long-term partnership, while another highlighted their ability to deliver complex projects successfully, showcasing a consistent high level of service.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1815382"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="256926"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1087997"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Cashback Portal Dev for Cam & Navigation System Manufacturer</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "

                Professional
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Professional
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently describe IT-solve as a professional and reliable partner in software development. One client emphasized the high level of knowledge and engagement demonstrated by their project manager, which facilitated timely delivery and effective communication. Another highlighted IT-solve&#39;s professionalism and ability to meet deadlines, contributing to strengthened client relationships. Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction with IT-solve&#39;s commitment to quality and responsiveness throughout the project lifecycle.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="175573"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="53398"
          data-gtm_insight_id="818349"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">IT Consulting & SI for Polish Caravan Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 14, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The full availability and <b>professionalism of Mrs. Karolina, IT-solve Project Manager</b>, meant that all the solutions associated with the preparation of the application were delivered with a large margin of time, which avoided all the mistakes that could prevent the publication of the application on time in the AppStore and Google Play stores. Contact with Karolina takes place via e-mail and phone calls - each time is friendly and provides specific information about the progress of work and application development process. Their <b>promptness in fulfilling inquiries, professional responses, and flexible offerings</b> are most impressive.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/it-solve/53398"

        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="175573"

          data-gtm_insight_id="818349"

            >ROCKETECH is a bespoke software development company specializing in end-to-end software engineering and full-stack development. The company is praised for its efficient project management, quick responsiveness, and ability to deliver tailored software solutions, with approximately 90% of reviews highlighting their adaptability and professionalism.                 Hard working
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Hard working
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently highlight Rocketech&#39;s strong work ethic and dedication. One client noted their impressive attitude and commitment, stating, &#39;I really appreciate their attitude and work ethic.&#39; Despite facing challenges with complex requirements, Rocketech&#39;s team actively listens and strives to meet client needs, demonstrating their hardworking nature. While there are occasional delays due to ambitious timelines, clients acknowledge their efforts to stay on schedule, reflecting an overall positive sentiment regarding their diligence.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="490146"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="39242"
          data-gtm_insight_id="880729"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web Development for Corporate Gift Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Dec 28, 2018</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Admittedly, we’re a bit difficult to work with because our business is complex. With that said, Rocketech <b>takes the time to listen and understand our needs</b>. I really appreciate their attitude and work ethic. They manage their time better. We have occasional delays, but we task them with some pretty aggressive timelines. They <b>do their best to stay on schedule</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Efficient
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        NextLink Labs has received high praise for their efficiency in project management and execution. Clients noted their proactive communication and adherence to deadlines, which contributed to a seamless migration of over 500 repositories with minimal downtime. One client specifically highlighted their ability to optimize CI/CD pipelines and handle complex integrations while maintaining workflow continuity, ultimately enhancing both efficiency and security in software development processes.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 23, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              NextLink Labs successfully streamlined our DevSecOps practices and migrated our repositories with minimal downtime. Their work has helped us <b>improve efficiency</b> and security in our software development processes. Their team was proactive and communicative, keeping us informed every step of the way. They stuck to deadlines and <b>managed the project efficiently</b>, addressing any blockers as soon as they arose.

            >
                Exceptional results
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceptional results
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        AgileEngine has consistently delivered exceptional results, as noted by clients who highlight their top-quality work and impressive ROI. One client emphasized the impressive coachability of the team, noting their ability to quickly adapt across different industry verticals and provide subject-matter expertise. Furthermore, the client appreciated the high-quality output at competitive pricing, stating that AgileEngine&#39;s offshore capabilities yield U.S.-quality work at a fraction of the cost. Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction with AgileEngine&#39;s performance and results.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="170095"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="142097"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1920473"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Analytics Suite for Boutique Advisory Firm</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 17, 2017</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The optimization of cost versus ROI comes from the fact that we’re using experienced developers coming from overseas. We get <b>U.S.-quality work at an offshore price</b>, and the <b>ROI is typically 3 times of what we would typically get from a local development shop</b>. AgileEngine has worked with very large brands, but they can also focus at a small-to-medium-enterprise level.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/agileengine/142097"

            aria-label="Read Full Review"

            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="142097"
            data-gtm_insight_id="1920473"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
      </ul>
    </div>

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Custom Software Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        SEO, Staff Aug &amp; Software Dev for Equipment Parts Retailer
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        —  AgileEngine's developers assist an equipment parts retailer's team with various SEO and software development tasks. They fix minor bugs, create front- and backend systems, design UX, and add new
        
        <a
          target="_blank"
          href="/go-to-review/agileengine/291753"
          title="Read Full Review on AgileEngine"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Flexible
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently highlight KOALA42&#39;s flexibility and approachability in their project management style. One client noted their ability to gain trust quickly due to their professional demeanor and adaptability. Despite being busy, they successfully managed resource allocation, showcasing their commitment to client needs. Overall, the sentiment regarding their flexibility is very positive, indicating that KOALA42 effectively accommodates client requirements while maintaining high standards.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          data-gtm_insight_id="1029133"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Website Redesign for Online Therapy Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 12, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They are very professional, <b>flexible</b> and approachable. Thus gaining our trust in very short time.
            </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Team players
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Mirumee Software for their collaborative approach, often describing them as an extension of their own teams. One client noted, &#39;I could tell they were committed to making our product available,&#39; highlighting their dedication. Another stated, &#39;Their philosophy of acting as an extension of our team has proven to be effective.&#39; Overall, the sentiment reflects strong appreciation for Mirumee&#39;s teamwork and commitment to client success, despite occasional communication challenges due to geographical differences.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">

            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Collaborative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Plan A received positive feedback for their collaborative approach, which was highlighted in multiple reviews. Clients noted their proactive communication and responsiveness to evolving needs, with one CEO stating that they felt as though they were working with an internal team. The project management was characterized by open channels for ideas and feedback, ensuring alignment with client objectives. Overall, the sentiment regarding collaboration was highly favorable, contributing significantly to project success.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

        Reviews mention Professional

      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The feedback regarding Functn&#39;s professionalism is overwhelmingly positive. Clients appreciate their &#39;goal-oriented team&#39; and the &#39;competent and skilled&#39; staff who provide detailed explanations of processes. One client noted their impressive speed in implementing requests and their commitment to meeting deadlines, despite minor delays.       </p>

            </div>

Functn works out proposals and solutions that often exceed our expectations. The feedback is overwhelmingly positive, with clients praising their professionalism, responsiveness, and seamless integration of developers into existing teams.             <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="80203"
              data-gtm_insight_id="793300"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Professional
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Professional
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall, Vention has received positive feedback regarding their professionalism. Clients noted their exceptional project management skills, characterized by clear communication and timely delivery. One client emphasized Vention&#39;s remarkable personal engagement and understanding of startup challenges, while another praised their swift completion of complex tasks with attention to detail. Additionally, clients appreciated the team&#39;s willingness to listen and adapt, further underscoring their professional approach. There were no significant areas for improvement mentioned, indicating a high level of client satisfaction.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="80203"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="319968"
          data-gtm_insight_id="793300"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">AR/VR Dev for Educational Platform</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 4, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The advisory team Vention put together was top-notch. We used a team of 3 as our primary conduits, but also met with the engineers and programmers. The swiftness they completed complicated topics, their receptiveness to changes; and the <b>professionalism and attention to detail</b> they all brought to the project.
            </p>
          </div>

            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev for Nursing Corporation</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 26, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Valery constantly brings things to my attention, as he's very forthcoming whenever there's a concern. Moreover, he's very <b>professional</b>. Initially, he didn't want to step on my toes, as I was the CEO. However, I told him that I didn't know what I was doing and to please be my eyes and ears on this project to tell me if I was missing something.
            </p>

          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">

            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">May 20, 2023</span>

            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The engineers were not only very <b>professional</b>, but you could tell they were also genuinely good people who wanted to help the team they were onboarding. This really helped move projects along and have everyone feel as they are one team.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Professional
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently highlight zerodays&#39; professionalism, noting excellent project management and timely delivery of results. One client emphasized their &#39;highly professional yet user-friendly approach,&#39; while another commended their &#39;quality of work and ethics.&#39; Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong alignment with client values and effective communication, contributing to a positive collaborative experience.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          class="provider-insight__review"

          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="282995"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1164635"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Personalized Nutrition Mobile App Dev for Research Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">

              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 17, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              I’m impressed with the <b>quality of their work and ethics</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

        >

        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="2095401"
          data-gtm_index="2"
          data-gtm_review_id="354367"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1164635"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web & Mobile App Development for Electric Co</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Feb 21, 2025</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              ZeroDays employed a well-structured approach to project management, delivering on-time and consistently addressing our needs: Weekly Meetings &amp; Reporting: They organized weekly calls to review progress, clarify requirements, and plan upcoming tasks. Following each meeting, they maintained a detailed document of notes and action items, ensuring accountability and clarity. Clear Communication Channels: Besides the scheduled meetings, most communication occurred via email and Telegram, providing a rapid and flexible way to share updates or seek clarifications. This proactive communication style minimized misunderstandings and kept tasks on track. Responsiveness &amp; Reliability: During our testing and revision phases, <b>ZeroDays was highly responsive. They provided clear, unambiguous answers and set realistic timelines, the vast majority of which they met or exceeded. This reliability proved instrumental in keeping the project moving forward smoothly and efficiently</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Easy to work with
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently highlight Neontri&#39;s ease of collaboration, noting their smooth communication and structured project management. One client from Decathlon Poland emphasized the &#39;super smooth&#39; process and high competency demonstrated during initial discussions. The team was commended for being responsive and maintaining full control over estimations and pricing, contributing to an overall positive experience. Overall, the sentiment regarding Neontri&#39;s approachability and professionalism is notably favorable.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="708829"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="13620"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1966486"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev for Sporting Goods Retailer</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Mar 17, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The quality of the solution and the whole process was brilliant. What was impressed – it was an experience with cooperation with big companies. They know, that we have to present budget to the board etc. so <b>the whole process was super smooth</b>!
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/neontri/13620"
            title="View Neontri Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Hard working
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback highlights CGS-team&#39;s strong work ethic, with multiple instances emphasizing their dedication. One client noted their &#39;interest in achieving the desired outcomes&#39; and responsiveness to feedback, stating they &#39;worked hard to understand our needs.&#39; Another client remarked on the team&#39;s &#39;hardworking lifestyle,&#39; praising their ability to deliver quality results consistently. Overall, the sentiment reflects a high level of appreciation for CGS-team&#39;s commitment and diligence in project execution.
      </p>
    </div>

          data-gtm_insight_id="1050942"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web Application Dev for Education Institution</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 27, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              During the development, they were very responsive to any feedbacks. <b>They worked hard to understand our needs and worked to achieve our goals as requested</b>. They maintained good communication with our team during the process.

          data-gtm_insight_id="1050942"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Staff Augmentation for Software Developers Marketplace</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Feb 1, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              All you hear about Ukrainians' hardworking lifestyle - that fits to CGS team too. The plank is set high, and <b>they keep pushing to their limits, while also being completely transparent if something is going not to the plan</b>. Additionally, communication is fast, my teammates and I can reach Oleksii easily to quickly find solution to the problem, because they know the price of everybody's time.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Communicative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently highlight GCD&#39;s strong communication skills, noting that team members, particularly Conor Owens, maintain regular check-ins and prioritize client needs effectively. One client emphasized the team&#39;s ability to communicate solutions that align with both their requirements and GCD&#39;s capabilities. Overall, feedback reflects a positive sentiment towards GCD&#39;s communicative approach, fostering a collaborative environment that enhances project outcomes.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

          class="provider-insight__review"

          data-gtm_insight_id="1955469"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Dev for Crime Reduction Organization</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 12, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Conor Owens checks in really regularly and makes sure that the GCD team are prioritising what we need done and makes sure it is done for when we need it. The team and Conor are <b>good at communicating and figuring out a solution</b> that works best for both us and them.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Hard working
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently highlight Ardas&#39;s strong work ethic and dedication. One CEO noted, &#34;You will never hear from them that something is impossible or difficult to do,&#34; emphasizing their problem-solving capabilities. Another reviewer appreciated their responsiveness, stating, &#34;They work from early morning until late at night.&#34; Overall, the sentiment reflects a high level of satisfaction with Ardas&#39;s commitment to delivering solutions and their willingness to engage deeply with client challenges.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="61319"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="33625"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1763152"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web and App Development for Aviation Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Aug 28, 2019</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              You will never hear from them that something is impossible or difficult to do. If you have any issues, they will find a way to solve them. From time to time, I would ask them really difficult questions, and within a few days, they would give me an answer. I’ve asked a lot of teams around the world the same questions and they weren’t able to give me an answer. Ardas proposed a few ideas on how to solve them and how to develop the solutions. We spoke to them every two or three days with some difficult projects, and I didn’t have any problems with them. They’re really open-minded and <b>they work from early morning until late at night</b>. I like them.
            </p>
          </div>

The client expressed confidence in DA-14&#39;s approach, stating, &#39;They’ve been transparent so we know exactly what’s going on,&#39; which contributes to an overall sentiment of trust and satisfaction.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Hard working
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Trigma has consistently received positive feedback regarding their hardworking nature. Clients have noted their diligence, with one stating they are &#39;very hardworking&#39; and always willing to check off all the boxes. Another client highlighted their efficiency, remarking that tasks are completed without reminders. Their commitment to project timelines and quality work has led to successful outcomes, reinforcing the sentiment that they are a dedicated and industrious partner.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1269690"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="142396"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1013847"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web Development for Tractor Parts Supplier</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">4.5</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 90%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">May 6, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They take all the burden off their customer, and they are always there. During the major development phases of the project, we've had a project manager that would give us daily updates on their progress and goals. Sometimes they took more time, but the product was really impressive. We had to be patient due to the uniqueness of their solution. They are cooperative, <b>hardworking</b>, and really imaginative. Their team is forthcoming, and they offer a fairly good price.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Flexible
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised EXLRT for their flexibility and responsiveness throughout the project lifecycle. One client noted their &#39;very responsive and flexible&#39; approach to multiple changes in requests, highlighting their quick responses to bug fixes and ongoing availability for discussions. Another emphasized their adaptability to changes in the work environment, showcasing a strong commitment to meeting client needs and ensuring project success.
      </p>
    </div>

        </li>
      
    </ul>

  </div>

  <p class="feedback__message">Was this helpful?</p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Great project management
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised ELITEX for their exceptional project management capabilities. One client highlighted the effectiveness of biweekly meetings with key contacts, emphasizing the team&#39;s integration into their organization. Another client noted the responsiveness and timely completion of tasks, facilitated through effective communication channels like Skype and Trello. Overall, the sentiment reflects a high level of satisfaction, with clients expressing confidence in ELITEX&#39;s ability to meet project needs efficiently.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Communicative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently commend RUBICON for their strong communication skills. One client highlighted the effectiveness of weekly sprint-planning meetings and daily contact with the product owner, emphasizing that RUBICON was always available on Skype. Another client noted their previous negative experiences with other outsourcing companies, contrasting them with RUBICON&#39;s reliability and promptness in communication. Overall, the sentiment is highly positive, with clients appreciating the transparency and accessibility throughout the project.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          class="provider-insight__review"

          data-gtm_insight_id="785976"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Dedicated Dev Team for Assessment Software </h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">4.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 80%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 15, 2017</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              It’s important for us to know exactly what they are doing, based on the JIRA planning system. I am happy with the level of <b>communication</b>. RUBICON was always <b>available on Skype</b>. Quality and <b>communication</b> are the words which come to mind when I think about RUBICON.
            </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Collaborative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback highlights Jellyfish.tech&#39;s strong collaborative approach, emphasizing effective communication and teamwork throughout the project. The project manager facilitated clear goal-setting and encouraged knowledge-sharing, creating a productive environment. One client noted the team&#39;s ability to actively listen and incorporate suggestions, which fostered a sense of value among team members. Overall, the sentiment was highly positive, with no areas for improvement identified, underscoring the company&#39;s commitment to collaboration.
      </p>
    </div>

            </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accessible
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The overall sentiment regarding Codahead&#39;s accessibility is highly positive. Clients have noted the team&#39;s responsiveness and clear communication, particularly highlighting the project manager&#39;s availability and care. One COO emphasized that the entire team is very responsive and efficient in meetings, while a CEO praised the consistent availability of their project manager, which facilitated effective communication. Although a minor language barrier was mentioned, it was deemed negligible compared to the company&#39;s overall accessibility and support.
      </p>
    </div>

<meta itemprop="position" content="22">

<div
    class="provider provider-row sg-show-more-less__container sg-show-more-less__container--collapsed provider-row--non-ppc "
    data-is-list="true"
    data-clutch-pid="1404171"
    data-title="Distributed"

    
        data-position="1122"
        data-type="Directory"
    
    
    itemprop="item"
    itemscope
    itemtype="https://schema.org/LocalBusiness"
    
>

    
    
    

    
    




<button
    type="button"

      <p class="provider-insight__description">

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Professional
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Deazy has received positive feedback regarding their professionalism, particularly for delivering projects on time and effectively managing client needs. Clients noted their impressive project management skills and ability to assemble skilled teams tailored to specific project requirements. One client appreciated their comprehensive handling of project administration, while another highlighted their responsiveness and ability to maintain a stable tech stack. Overall, the sentiment reflects satisfaction with Deazy&#39;s professionalism, though one client mentioned difficulties in communication.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1524021"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="243268"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1934254"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Dev for Climate Tech Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">4.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 80%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 23, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The company <b>takes care of all project management and post-project administration</b>. Deliverables were on time, although it was hard to get hold of them via the phone. It took a long time to get a support arrangement that worked for us as a startup without a CTO.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Efficient
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have praised Jappware for their impressive efficiency and responsiveness in project management. One client noted that Jappware quickly turned around initial projects with high quality, leading to an ongoing partnership. The ability to work with minimal detail while still delivering excellent results was highlighted as a significant advantage. Additionally, the direct communication and flexibility demonstrated by Jappware have fostered a productive working relationship, with clients expressing satisfaction with the overall efficiency of their collaboration.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1299018"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="142858"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1017986"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Development for Recruiting Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Feb 18, 2020</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The quality has been very good and more than that <b>the efficiency in which we work together is impressive</b>. Because they’re offshore, being able to have that direct communication with them and have them just get it without having to provide a lot of details with a lot of specs has been really great. They’re so flexible and I can just have a conversation with them. If anything comes back that we don’t like, they’ll change it with no questions asked.
            </p>
          </div>

        Reviews mention Well-executed projects
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Codempire has received overwhelmingly positive feedback for their well-executed projects, particularly for the development of an educational Career Design Simulation Game. Clients praised their &#39;excellent communication, problem solving, and technical skills.&#39; The project was completed within six months, demonstrating Codempire&#39;s ability to manage timelines effectively. Avid Adventures noted that the game has successfully attracted global users and has been played by hundreds, reflecting Codempire&#39;s commitment to quality and scalability in their work.
      </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accessible
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The overall sentiment regarding accessibility in Modeso&#39;s services is highly positive. Clients appreciated the team&#39;s responsiveness and availability, with one client noting they were accessible 24/7 and addressed bugs within hours. Another highlighted the CEO&#39;s approachability, allowing for direct communication on concerns. The consistent availability of project managers for workshops and the ability to communicate in native languages further contributed to a transparent and collaborative environment, enhancing client satisfaction.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1894526"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="111865"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1105409"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">IT System Development for University Hospital</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 14, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Our partnership is great because of modeso's technical knowledge and responsiveness. <b>They're available 24/7 to help us</b>; their team fixes bugs within a few hours. modeso outsources some of their development to lower overhead costs, but modeso manages the project in-house. Their project managers are always <b>available to come in for in-person project workshops</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

        Reviews mention Hard working

      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently highlighted Euristiq&#39;s hardworking nature, noting their ability to deliver results efficiently without compromising on communication or team dynamics. One client emphasized, &#34;Euristiq was an exceptional team to work with; they work hard and produce results,&#34; reflecting an overall positive sentiment regarding their dedication and responsiveness throughout the project.             <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 29, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Euristiq communicated well and moved quickly; they were able to complete tasking and demonstrate progress on a weekly basis. Project management was excellent, they were able to quickly jump on all of our questions or bugs and delivered results in a timely manner. Euristiq was an exceptional team to work with; <b>they work hard and produce results</b>, but don't sacrifice personability to get things done, very pleasant group to work with.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Communicative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Codex Software has received positive feedback regarding their communication skills. Clients noted their responsiveness and proactive approach, with one stating they were &#39;very good at communication in general and supporting the project.&#39; Another highlighted that the account manager was &#39;easy to reach,&#39; allowing for flexibility in meeting project aims. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Codex&#39;s ability to maintain clear and effective communication throughout the project lifecycle.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="234888"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="140463"
          data-gtm_insight_id="831983"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Software Development for IT Consultancy Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 30, 2019</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We did our testing through Postman, and they fixed bugs pretty quickly. In fact, we’ve asked them for help just recently, about certain functionalities they implemented at the time. <b>They got back to us quickly, and easily explained what was going on</b>, without any extra charge. <b>They’re very good at communication in general and supporting the project</b>.
            </p>

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceeds expectations
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have reported that KOIA consistently exceeds expectations, particularly in their ability to deliver improvements during the onboarding process. One CEO noted a significant 50-60% reduction in development time and praised the team&#39;s work ethic and flexibility, which contributed to a lean and efficient development process. The client emphasized that KOIA&#39;s independent developers effectively addressed complex tasks and maintained alignment with project priorities, leading to enhanced long-term planning and reduced overall development costs.
      </p>

    <div id="lm-methodology-accordion" class="lm-only-related-block lm-methodology sg-accordion sg-accordion-large sg-accordion-bordered sg-accordion-contrast">
        <button
            type="button"
            aria-label="Portfolio & Awards"
            class="sg-accordion__title-wrapper sg-secondary-title sg-secondary-title--icon-plus"
            data-dom__data-accordion-status="open"
        >
            <span class="container sg-accordion__title sg-secondary-title__text">
                How the Leaders Matrix Works
            </span>
        </button>

        <div class="container sg-accordion__contents">
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-1">
                <p class="lm-methodology__text">
                    A Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the top-performing companies in a particular service or
                    location. Each company featured in a Leaders Matrix is evaluated based on Focus and Ability to Deliver.
                    The size of each circle indicates that company’s size.

                    <a
                        target="_blank"
                        href="https://clutch.co/methodology"
                        title="Learn More about Leaders Matrix Methodology"
                        class="lm-methodology__link"
                        aria-label="Click LM Methodology Learn More"
                        data-gtm_event_category="click_lm_methodology_learn_more"
                    >
                        Learn More
                    </a>
                </p>
            </div>
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-2">
                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Focus</b> (x-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Focus accounts for a company’s specialization within a certain service.</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Ability to Deliver</b> (y-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Ability to Deliver considers three criteria:</p>

                <ol class="lm-methodology__list">
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Client feedback and reviews</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Work experience and previous projects</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Market presence and reputation in the industry</li>
                </ol>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

            <section class="directory-only-related-block programmatic-content mmg"><div class="mmg-content-section">
<div class="container"><article class="sc-excerpt">
	<header class="sc-excerpt__header">
		<h2>Comparing Custom Software Development Agencies: Your Comprehensive Guide</h2>
	</header>
	<div class="sc-excerpt__intro">
		<p>In today's fast-paced business landscape, finding the right service provider is crucial for success. Whether you're a CEO, a Founder,  or a CTO, choosing the best partner for your specific needs can make all the difference. That's where Clutch comes in, serving as your go-to resource for comparing and selecting Software Engineering companies. With over 67,641 reviews and ratings from real customers, Clutch provides valuable insights to help you make informed decisions. Learn more about the world of Software Development service providers, exploring key data points, including the most popular, best-rated, and budget-friendly companies.</p>
<p>Before we dive into the specifics, let's get an overview of the Custom Software Development landscape on Clutch. Currently, there are approximately 10,292 companies with ratings and reviews in this category. These companies serve a wide range of clients, including Microsoft, Deloitte, NDA, and many more. In terms of clientele, 11,604 companies cater to Small Businesses, 7,610 to the MidMarket and 2,474 to the Enterprise. These companies span various industries, including Information technology, eCommerce, Business services, Medical,  and Financial services, among others.</p>
<p> Check the drop downs below for summaries of Custom Software Development companies by:</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="#anchor-most-popular" itemprop="url">Most Popular</a></li>
<li><a href="#anchor-industries-served" itemprop="url">Industries Served</a></li>
<li><a href="#anchor-agencies-by-specialty" itemprop="url">Agencies by Specialty</a></li>
</ul>
<p>Clutch is your comprehensive resource for comparing and selecting the best Custom Software Development companies based on reviews, ratings, and data points. With a diverse range of providers, budgets, and service focus areas, you can make an informed decision to propel your business forward. Whether you're a large enterprise, a midsize firm, or a small business, Clutch has the information you need to find the perfect partner for your Software Engineering needs.</p>

	</div>

</article>
</div>

<div class="container"><article id="sc-content-block-1" class="sc-content-block collapsible" data-min="3" data-max="3">

        <div class="sc-content-block__intro"><style>

    html {
        scroll-padding-top: 106px;
    }
}

    html {
        scroll-padding-top: 127px;
    }
}
@media (992px <= width < 1201px) {
    html {
        scroll-padding-top: 175px;
    }
}

    html {
        scroll-padding-top: 135px;
    }
}

                    <button class="faq-question faq--button" id="anchor-agencies-by-specialty">Agencies by Specialty</button>
                    <div class="faq--content"><h3>Custom Software Development Agencies by Specialty</h3>

Understanding a company's specialties can help you find a provider that aligns with your specific needs. Some of the most common areas Custom Software Development companies focus on are listed below, but this is only the tip of the iceberg. Our Software Engineering service providers specialize in many areas including JavaScript, Amazon Application Development Framework, PHP, NodeJS, Linux server, React, SQL,  and WordPress CMS, and more:

%20content,%20producing%20explainer%20videos,%20product%20walkthroughs,%20commercials,%20and%20app%20videos.%20Their%20videos%20have%20generated%20over%201.3%20billion%20views,%20making%20their%20videos%20widely%20recognized%20across%20the%20globe.%20From%20concept%20to%20post-production,%20including%20scriptwriting,%20storyboarding,%20and%20motion%20graphics,%20Vidico%20delivers%20end-to-end%20video%20solutions%20that%20help%20challenger%20brands%20grow%20and%20engage%20their%20audiences.%3C/li%3E%0A%0A%20%20%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Ca%20href=%22https://clutch.co/profile/signature-video-group%22%20target=%22%22%3ESignature%20Video%20Group%3C/a%3E%3C/strong%3E%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EHQ%20Location:%3C/strong%3E%20Toronto,%20Canada%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EAvg.%20Hourly%20Rate:%3C/strong%3E%20Undisclosed%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3E#%20of%20Reviews:%3C/strong%3E%2044%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EReview%20Rating:%3C/strong%3E%205.0%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20Signature%20Video%20Group%20(SVG)%20is%20a%20Toronto-based%20video%20production%20company%20and%20content%20agency%20specializing%20in%20creating%20impactful%20visual%20stories.%20They%20produce%20a%20wide%20range%20of%20video%20content,%20including%20broadcast%20commercials,%20branded%20documentaries,%20corporate%20communications,%20product%20demos,%20and%20training%20videos.%20SVG%20collaborates%20with%20clients%20to%20craft%20campaigns%20that%20drive%20business%20results,%20attract%20top%20talent,%20and%20simplify%20complex%20ideas.%3C/li%3E%0A%0A%20%20%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Ca%20href=%22https://clutch.co/profile/snowy-peak-films%22%20target=%22%22%3ESnowy%20Peak%20Films%3C/a%3E%3C/strong%3E%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EHQ%20Location:%3C/strong%3E%20Denver,%20CO%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EAvg.%20Hourly%20Rate:%3C/strong%3E%20$100%20-%20$149%20/%20hr%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3E#%20of%20Reviews:%3C/strong%3E%2041%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EReview%20Rating:%3C/strong%3E%205.0%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20Snowy%20Peak%20Films%20is%20a
